title: Wificoin
description:
Pay As You Go Inflight Wifi / Internet. One-click access to inflight wifi in 5000+ airplanes. Watch movies, play online games, or browse the internet on the flight with Wificoin.


Cheapest & reusable credits which can be used on the ground also. Get unlimited VPN and access to over 65 million wifi hotspots in 180 countries.
